entry.title: Rite Aid To Close All Stores - What happens to the Roseburg Store?
entry.summary: Rite Aid is closing all remaining stores nationwide as part of its bankruptcy wind-down. Once operating over 4,500 locations, the chain is shutting down its final stores by mid-2025, with liquidation sales and prescription transfers underway across multiple states.
